meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Volk Kellie Chan Jared Hall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6670.

td.p: Matt Volk, a financial analyst from Cedar Rapids, Iowa
Kellie Chan, a graduate student of biology from Chuluota, Florida
Jared Hall, a graduate student in global policy studies from Austin, Texas (whose 6-day cash winnings total $181,001)

tr.td: NEWSMEN
SPECIAL MONTHS
HEADING "NORTH"
BESTSELLERS
DO YOU COMPUTE?
REPHRASING CLICHES

Kellie
